skins.selfIntroduction: I'm battleship Izumo, of the Sakura Empire. I existed as a proposed Yamato-class design, although they didn't construct me... But if you look down me even slightly then prepare to taste one of my main cannon volleys.
skins.acquisition: Battleship Izumo, reporting in. Are you the Commander? Sure don't look very reliable... Listen here: do anything to slow me down, and you won't hear the end of it!
skins.login: Late, as always. Just how long will you keep me waiting?
skins.details: If you've got time to stare at me then maybe do your work instead.
skins.secretaryIdle1: A blade requires careful maintenance. Isn't that obvious?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Sisters... eh. The Izumo class consists of just me, so I guess I'm a bit jealous.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Become stronger, Commander. Once you become strong enough to protect everyone... Once that happens, I...
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, you don't have the free time to endlessly chat with me.

skins.shipDescription: You'd like to see my classical dance? Your tastes are quite refined, Commander... In that case, I'll show you the finest performance in the land!
skins.acquisition: You'd like to see my classical dance? Your tastes are quite refined, Commander... In that case, I'll show you the finest performance in the land!
skins.details: My name has connections to classical dancing...? I-I see...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Dancing and my sword are much alike. Untold hours of learning and practice are for a single moment of brilliance...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, if I really captivate you so... will you be able to finish your work?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Savory delicacies and mature festivities... I say why not enjoy the New Year and let loose for once? Hahahah!
skins.secretaryTouch: ... Drunk? Me? I've only had a few... *Hick*
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, are you insinuating you want a swift kick?
